    • Uses of RequestContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.auditlog

      Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.auditlog that implement RequestContextListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ScpNeoAuditLogRequestContextListener
      Implementation of RequestContextListener that performs the JNDI lookup of the connectivity configuration and authentication header service objects on SCP Neo.

    • Uses of RequestContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity

      Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity that implement RequestContextListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DestinationsRequestContextListener
      Implementation of RequestContextListener that enables the correct use of Destinations when working with non-container managed threads on all supported Cloud platforms.
      class  ScpNeoDestinationsRequestContextListener
      Implementation of RequestContextListener that performs the JNDI lookup of the connectivity configuration and authentication header service objects on SCP Neo.

    • Uses of RequestContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security

      Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security that implement RequestContextListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AuthTokenRequestContextListener
      Implementation of RequestContextListener that obtain the current Jwt bearer from the Authorization header of the current request when working with non-container managed threads on SAP Cloud Platform Cloud Foundry.

    • Uses of RequestContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security.secret

      Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security.secret that implement RequestContextListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ScpNeoSecretStoreRequestContextListener
      Implementation of RequestContextListener that performs the JNDI lookup of the password storage and key store service objects on SCP Neo.

    • Uses of RequestContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security.user

      Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security.user that implement RequestContextListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UserRequestContextListener
      Implementation of RequestContextListener that ensures the correct initialization of Users when working with non-container managed threads on all supported Cloud platforms.

    • Uses of RequestContextListener in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRequestContextListener
      Abstract base class for RequestContextListeners that store a certain map of properties in a RequestContext.
